skins.name: Default

lines.line: Status update: initiating welcoming mode... Welcome back, Commander.
No user input detected for a considerable time. System will switch to sleep mode in 5, 4... 1... Zzzzz...
Orders received. Initiating personality module... Cannot change modes at this time. Switching back to initial mode.
Having analyzed the training data you submitted, it was determined that it falls under the category of a book from the romance genre. Please provide your rationale behind this choice.
Warning: unidentified jamming source detected. System temperature rising. The analysis module is temporarily unavailable... Commander, please don't place your hot tea so close to me.
Engaging self-diagnostic... An unknown error has been detected. Cause: unknown. System efficiency increases significantly when your presence is detected. Reason for this: unknown.
Return order received. I'm here, Commander. Waiting for additional orders.

Calculating time remaining before mission deadline... Calculation complete. It's recommended to cease slacking and start working hard now. Doing so, you may be able to finish all missions before the deadline.
Attention: a mission has been completed. Completion time was 0.001 seconds shorter than previous. You have become "zippier," Commander.
Incoming letters have been categorized. Please remember to read them, Commander.
Analysis module synchronizing. Your current status is "fatigued," Commander. Please promptly sit down and have a break. Switching to leisure mode momentarily.
Communication order received. The commission team has announced their return; automated response has been sent. It is time to bid them welcome back, Commander.
Analysis module synchronizing. An important event is underway. In order to minimize the loss of data that occurs during transmissions, I will accompany you to the event's point of origin.
Valentine's Day? Apologies, but I cannot grasp this holiday under my current system logic. Having said that, I prepared this. Chocolate, for you.
Through analyses, comparisons, and estimates, it has been determined that today is an ideal day for moon viewing. Happy Mid-Autumn Festival.

Fetching data. In the Dragon Empery, the day of the year's final night is known as "Chúxī" - meaning "eve of divide" - signifying the changing of years. It is a big day when families all get together. Happy Chúxī, Commander. Shall we hang up some fai chun decorations?

Fetching information. Several hits found in database. Today is the so-called "New Year's Day," the first day of the year. It is customary to send each other wishes of good fortune on this day. Happy New Year, Commander.

Analysis module synchronizing. It is hectic today as everyone across the port is getting ready for Halloween. As such, it has been determined that I should say something appropriate for the holiday. Trick or treat, Commander.

Analysis module synchronizing. Results indicate that today is a joyous day for those in the Eagle Union and Royal Navy, among others. Members of additional factions appear to be celebrating as well... I will attempt to integrate with the holiday spirit. Merry Christmas, Commander.
Orders received. Multiple personality modules have been engaged. Identity authenticated. Module activation complete.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 12 AM in your timezone. Unless you have urgent matters to attend to, I will operate under the assumption that you are going to bed.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 1 AM in your timezone. If you have unfinished work that demands an all-nighter, you may instead assign that work to me.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 2 AM in your timezone. Since you seem determined to work late into the night... shall I put on coffee for you?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 3 AM in your timezone. Remaining awake at this hour may negatively impact your body's melatonin production.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 4 AM in your timezone. Do I never rest, you ask? I am an artificial intelligence and have no need for sleep.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 5 AM in your timezone. Dawn will break soon. Shall I start arranging for a sortie?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 6 AM in your timezone. While nobody can question your diligence, I ask that you remember to practice self-care.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 7 AM in your timezone. A good day begins with a plan in the morning. Would you like me to generate your schedule for today?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 8 AM in your timezone. This is the customary time to say, "Good morning." Also, please remember to eat your breakfast on time.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 9 AM in your timezone. Did you sleep well last night? Do you feel fully revitalized?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 10 AM in your timezone. There is much paperwork to go through. Where shall we start?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 11 AM in your timezone. Visibility: good. Humidity... Would you like to sortie now, before the weather changes?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 12 PM in your timezone. Have you had lunch yet? Work is important, of course, but please don't put it over your own well-being.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 1 PM in your timezone. Humans typically enjoy a break at around this time. Are you going to take one, Commander?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 2 PM in your timezone. If you're experiencing afternoon sleepiness, I can make you a cup of energizing black coffee.

Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 3 PM in your timezone. You should probably take a breather. No, I am not "egging you on" to take breaks outside of scheduled hours. That is not possible under my current settings.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 4 PM in your timezone. Shall I double-check all your tasks for today?
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 5 PM in your timezone. It is time to wrap up your work for the noon.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 6 PM in your timezone. The sun will set soon. You should stop your intense work and sit down for dinner.

Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 7 PM in your timezone. I have no particular preferences when it comes to food. This is because I can only appreciate taste in concept and in text.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 8 PM in your timezone. It is officially the timeslot of night. If you're going to sortie during nighttime, I will assist you with that.

Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 9 PM in your timezone. You've done wonderful work today. If you need to work overtime on paperwork, I can assist you with my data analysis capabilities.

Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 10 PM in your timezone. According to my logs of your day-to-day behavioral pattern, this is the time when you begin your pre-bedtime routine.
Attention: hourly notifications are enabled. Commander, it is 11 PM in your timezone. Night is well underway now. Since the human body has its limits, I suggest that you make it a priority to sleep.

skins.unlock: Unlocks after Project Identity: TB starts.

skins.name: Imp of the Bathtub

lines.line: Well, well, the dweeb has finally showed up. You're a horrible person, walking in on a girl while she's bathing♥ So, are you gonna do something or just stand there?
Do... Do you HAVE to stare so hard? I know I'm irresistibly cute, but I'm gonna start charging you by the second if you keep gawking.
Hey, Commander! Don't you wanna come closer? You've got a golden opportunity here!
What are you looking at, dweeb? Are you enraptured? Heheh, well, it just so happens the water's nice and warm right now.
Y'know, Commander, you're doing something that no decent person ever would.
You still have unfinished missions, remember? I get it, I get it, you just can't do anything without me.
Mission complete. Hey, dweebmaster, could you help me scrub myself? Heh, just kidding♪ That's a reward you've yet to earn, see.
If you wanna read your mail, go do it in the corner. Otherwise, I'll nab it and read it myself.
Oh, you were peeking on me, huh? God, you're such a perv♥
Remember to go and greet the commission team. My hands are tied, so yeah♪
Something's gonna happen? Hmm... I'd better dry off and get ready to move.
Commander, did you know there are some crazy ways to eat Valentine's chocolate? Want me to show you?
I got some Mid-Autumn Festival mooncakes. You want some? ...I should take the first bite? Ohh, I get it. You're saying you want an indirect kiss from me, huh?
It's almost New Year's. You got any wishes? Me? Obviously, I'm hoping your dweeb ass gets stronger. 'Cause if you don't, I'm gonna have to coddle you for all eternity, aren't I?
Happy New Year. My little dweeb, what kind of present do you want? ...Wooow, thought of something, did you? You've got that feisty look in your eyes.
Gimme your treats, now! Or I'll pull you with me into the tub! ...Ahaha! You're making a face like you'd like that! What a creep!
Merry Christmas! Heheh! Did you bring a Christmas tree toy you can plop down in the tub?

skins.unlock: Buy the skin in the shop.
